info.name: Murray Rowan
info.description: I'm a multi-talented catalyst for solving engineering problems—who specializes in learning quickly and deeply in order to lead by example. I've always been a builder, and nothing brings me more joy than crafting high-quality code while helping others.

sections.experience: My career pattern is as follows: when I start at a company, I tend to be relatively underqualified; when I leave, I am an invaluable asset and tech advisor there.
sections.education: Academically and athletically, I have always excelled at school.
sections.interests: In no particular order, here's a bunch of things I enjoy:
sections.references: I believe the vast majority of people I've worked with hold me in very high regard. I'd love to tailor some that are relevant to you upon request.

experience.name: Paper Education
experience.title: Lead Front-End Developer
experience.description: Managed (and/or contributed alongside) various squads of engineers through countless successful major features and special projects (e.g. Student Achievements, Pub/Sub Emulator Tools, Web Toolkit, Chrome Extension, Templated MicroFrontends, introducing TypeScript, full-platform refactors/upgrades). Meanwhile, consistently topped IC stats, and organized and led Front-End Strategy group.

experience.name: Renoworks Software
experience.title: Senior Web Application Developer
experience.description: Hired to build an MVP app for transforming company's 2D product(s) into the third dimension (visualizing home reno products on real photos and custom-generated 3D models). Thereafter, forged an entirely overhauled engineering presence—from process to technology to strategy and beyond.

experience.name: SMART Technologies
experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: Bridged the code gap between design and back-end development in industry-spanning enterprise setting; led the charge in modernizing legacy digital assets, along with architecting an internal component prototying tool.

experience.name: Business Instincts Group
experience.title: Web Developer / IT Manager
experience.description: Developed, maintained, and oversaw all digital assets (websites/apps, IT infrastructure) for venture-creation / business consulting firm and its numerous startups.

experience.name: Calgary Cinematheque
experience.title: Admin Coordinator
experience.description: Acted upon all orders of business for non-profit theatrical film exhibition society: from box office accounting to web administration.

experience.name: Calgary Society of Independent Filmmakers
experience.title: Communications Coordinator
experience.description: Administered all internal and public relations duties; e.g. publishing weekly e-newsletters and maintaining member databases.

experience.name: Calgary Society of Independent Filmmakers
experience.title: Production Coordinator
experience.description: Oversaw extensive film/video production facility, including: handling of a high-volume of professional equipment, and coordinating all in-house technical operations.

experience.name: Calgary International Film Festival
experience.title: Print Traffic Assistant
experience.description: Oversaw the shipping and receiving of all film prints at annual festival. Calmly handled all time-sensitive (and notoriously unpredictable) issues that arose.

experience.name: Birchcliff Energy Ltd.
experience.title: Graphic Designer
experience.description: Designed and produced a corporate one-pager, along with various other presentation materials.

experience.name: Bethany Care Society - Corporate Headquarters
experience.title: Data Entry
experience.description: Logged private survey data, then designed and implemented a secure web-based interface and database backend for data analysis.

experience.name: Barbecues Galore
experience.title: Warehouse & Sales
experience.description: Assembled barbeques, staffed warehouse, and manned the sales floor.

experience.name: Papa John's Pizza
experience.title: Cook
experience.description: Cooked and prepared pizzas and pizza ingredients.

education.name: University of Calgary
education.title: Bachelor of Arts in Film Studies
